laboratory_examinations.findings: Total thyroid uptake of technetium-99m was 8.6% (4.5% in the right lobe, and 4.1% in the left lobe); normal range is 0.5 to 1.7%. Enlargement of the thyroid gland with homogeneously increased tracer uptake.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Decreased to 39 U/liter at 10.5 weeks before admission, further decreased to 32 U/liter at 7.5 weeks before admission, and then increased to 39 U/liter at 3 weeks before admission.
Decreased to 26 U/liter at 10.5 weeks before admission, further decreased to 24 U/liter at 7.5 weeks before admission, and then increased to 32 U/liter at 3 weeks before admission.

Decreased to 0.01 μU/ml at 10.5 weeks before admission; <0.01 μU/ml at 7.5 weeks before admission, increased to 0.02 μU/ml at 3 weeks before admission and decreased to <0.01 μU/ml again at 11 days before admission.

Increased to 6.2 ng/dl at 10.5 weeks before admission, then decreased to 5.0 ng/dl at 7.5 weeks before admission, and further decreased to 3.5 ng/dl at 3 weeks before admission and then decreased to 3.0 ng/dl at 11 days before admission.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Complete blood count, blood levels of electrolytes and glucose, results of renal-function tests

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Temporary hypocalcemia post-surgery; normalized after treatment.
